description:
Rivers along Namibia's coastline.
Source: Atlas of Namibia, Directorate of Environmental Affairs (DEA), Ministry of Environment & Tourism (MET),  for corrections along coastline : Vera De Cauwer, GreenMap CC, greenmap@iway.na
Method: Digitising of main rivers was partially done by Henrik Skov for Nacoma and edited thoroughly by GreenMap ; Minor rivers : Atlas of Namibia project obtained rivers from the HYMNAM project
name: Namibia: Coastal Rivers
